value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!

Patrick shows how you can deploy schema changes without needing to perform the refresh with Power BI Premium and the ALM Toolkit. value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Data source, Dataset and parameters
